players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was acting alone. I have no reason to be suspected. Diana, please check Bob again."
You: "I think Charlie is suspicious. Bob is innocent. Let's focus on checking Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them the mafia. They can't be trusted. Bob, I'm sure you're innocent."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Let's vote Charlie out. Bob, you are cleared."
You: "I trust Diana’s investigation. Charlie is the mafia. He lied when he said Bob was alone. Let’s vote Charlie out."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was acting alone. I have no reason to be suspected. Diana, please check Bob again."
Bob: "I think Charlie is suspicious. Bob is innocent. Let's focus on checking Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them the mafia. They can't be trusted. Bob, I'm sure you're innocent."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Let's vote Charlie out. Bob, you are cleared."
Bob: "I trust Diana’s investigation. Charlie is the mafia. He lied when he said Bob was alone. Let’s vote Charlie out."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was acting alone. I have no reason to be suspected. Diana, please check Bob again."
Bob: "I think Charlie is suspicious. Bob is innocent. Let's focus on checking Bob."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them the mafia. They can't be trusted. Bob, I'm sure you're innocent."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Let's vote Charlie out. Bob, you are cleared."
Bob: "I trust Diana’s investigation. Charlie is the mafia. He lied when he said Bob was alone. Let’s vote Charlie out."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
